comment.author: 8715708@N03
comment._content:
Google Translate and some other online German-English dictionaries I've found online aren't offering up a translation of "fuhrerdondel", or even of "dondel".

Any actual German speakers able to help?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/wirelizard] Thanks...these captions are taken directly from the images...and the hand writting is not 100 percent clear, so we did the best we could!
